title: cloudbuilt
extract: Cloudbuilt is an indie speedrunning game. ... The core concepts of the game are path exploration and speed. Each level has a central path which is easier than the fastest path which requires much faster reflexes and planning.
extract_html: Cloudbuilt is an indie speedrunning game. ... The core concepts of the game are path exploration and speed. Each level has a central path which is easier than the fastest path which requires much faster reflexes and planning.
